welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Dimas, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport offers exclusive services and amenities for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves domestic flights to and from various cities in the United States.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments for the region.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Compton Airport, handling freight and cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
